articles.description: "Rockstar" rapper claims the property manager tried to prevent him from filming a music video last December
articles.content:
Rapper DaBaby faces a criminal charge for allegedly assaulting a man who he said tried to stop his crew from making a music video on his property.
The singer is being charged with felony battery by … [+1630 chars]

articles.title: How the ‘Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent’ VFX Team Made Nicolas Cage Young Again - Variety
articles.description: The VFX team on “The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent” is no stranger to the intensive process of de-aging a known figure such as Nicolas Cage. For the film, the team was tasked to make Cage, who is 58 years old, appear about 20-25 years younger for the ch…
